javadoc: Simple interface for a graph vertex.

methods.javadoc:
Set the name of the vertex.  Usually it's label on the graph display.
@param name the new vertex name.
methods.name: setName
methods.comment: Set the name of the vertex.  Usually it's label on the graph display.

methods.javadoc:
Get the name of the vertex.
@return vertex name
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name of the vertex.

methods.name: getID
methods.comment:
Get the unique ID string tagged to the vertex.  This was set when
 the vertex was created.

methods.name: setAttribute
methods.comment:
Set an attribute on this edge.

 NOTE: you must also define the attribute name on the graph
   display that this graph edge will be displayed on.

methods.name: getAttribute
methods.comment: Get the value of an attribute.

return.comment: the string value of the attribute

name: GraphVertex
comment: Simple interface for a graph vertex.
